thread.title: 3D Printed Machine Sorts Skittles by Color
thread.title_full: 3D Printed Machine Sorts Skittles by Color

title: 3D Printed Machine Sorts Skittles by Color
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
9 Sep 2015 01:19 AM EST 
Do you just really hate orange-flavored Skittles? Well, why waste your time sorting them out yourself (and getting your hands covered in candy in the process) when there’s a robot that can do it for you! It’s a 3D-printed device, powered by a micro controller that detects individual colors of Skittles and puts them in different bowls for you. Peterson used an Arduino Uno board and a Zitrades color sensor to detect the shades of the Skittles so they could be sorted into their respective dishes.
